snippet: Nigel Lythgoe, the executive producer of "So You Think You Can Dance," revealed in a Twitter message that the network had canceled the results show for the season scheduled to start in May.
abstract: Nigel Lythgoe, the executive producer of "So You Think You Can Dance," revealed in a Twitter message that the network had canceled the results show for the season scheduled to start in May.

headline.main: New Reality on Fox: Hurry Up and Dance
headline.print_headline: New Reality on Fox: Hurry Up and Dance
